author: Marcus Aurelius
message: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe.
title: Thought of the day

author: Sophocles
message: Ignorant men don't know what good they hold in their hands until they've flung it away.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Einstein
message: When the solution is simple, God is answering.
title: Thought of the day

author: Napoleon Hill
message: All achievements, all earned riches, have their beginning in an idea.
title: Thought of the day
